content.description: Starts just around the corner to the left of Indiana Jones and the Temple of Choss. Start up the left facing/leaning thin hands dihedral. Eventually you'll have to move out left onto the face onto some fuzzy face holds and up into a horizontal finger crack. Finish with a bomber jug/hand jam up and right, or go farther if you have bigger balls than the first ascentionist, probably solid 11.

climbs.name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Choss
climbs.fa: Jake Fancy Dickerson & not Ben Crawford

content.description: Follow a handcrack that slightly overhangs before getting on top of a ledge. From this ledge you can go up the low angled OW crack that goes up a bit further. Jump off to climbers left!! The rock below to the right gives it the PG-13 rating.
content.protection: There is a shallow rock to climbers right of this route. Make sure to jump off to the climbers left when at the top. We used it to wait our go and stand on. DWS
content.location: To the left of finger crack. Immediately after first horse shoe entering Davis.

content.description: Start with wide hands and move up to a big pod with use of some face holds. The business starts when you pull out of the pod on fist jams follow the slightly overhanging crack as the jams get wider to big fists. And actually pretty good rock for being previously submerged!
content.location: To the right of finger crack. Imediately after first horse shoe entering Davis

content.description: Start in the water with a handjam and begin working up the less than good finger jams. Small pod in middle good for the feet. After the main finger crack you can scramble higher to the right on various holds and cracks. Water capacity was at 45% when we did this, probably would be a much sicker line if the waterline dropped!
content.location: Right after the first horseshoe upon entering 50 Mile Creek. On your left. OW Pod route to the right and handcrack to the left.
